channel.title: robots on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in robots on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-22
item.description: Alphabet is putting its prototype robots to work cleaning up around Google’s offices (3 minute read) Alphabet’s Everyday Robots Project team has released some of its prototype machines onto Google’s Bay Area campuses to carry out light custodial tasks.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-11
item.description: Google Pixel 6 leak teases Magic Eraser feature, plus five years of Android security updates (2 minute read) Leaks from a marketing website seem to confirm that the Pixel 6 will have a new Magic Eraser feature and get five years of Android security updates.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-06
item.description: Microsoft tests Super-Duper Secure Mode for Edge (1 minute read) Super Duper Secure Mode is a new feature being tested by Microsoft’s Edge Vulnerability Research team.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-23
item.description: Brave’s nontracking search engine is now in beta (8 minute read) Brave’s search engine has been launched in global beta.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-07
item.description: Facebook’s ‘Bulletin’ newsletter platform could launch before the end of June (2 minute read) Facebook’s newsletter subscription service Bulletin could be launched before the end of June.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-25
item.description: Pfizer trials new pill that could stop early-stage Covid in its tracks (3 minute read) Pfizer has started stage one clinical trials on an oral pill designed to be an early intervention for Covid-19.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-08
item.description: How Boston Dynamics Taught Its Robots to Dance (12 minute read) Last week, Boston Dynamics released a video of its robots dancing.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-22
item.description: LinkedIn cuts 960 jobs as pandemic puts the brakes on corporate hiring (1 minute read) LinkedIn reported on Tuesday that it would cut about 960 jobs due to the sustained impact that the coronavirus pandemic is having on the demand for its recruitment products.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-10
item.description: Google confirms new Nest smart speaker with official photo and video (1 minute read) Google has confirmed that it is working on a new Nest smart speaker.
